resources.string: Why do you like this character?
Blossom is the leader of the Powerpuff Girls. With red hair and a pink dress, she is determined, brave, and intelligent.
Bubbles, one of the Powerpuff Girls, is the sweetest and most sensitive of the trio. She has long hair and wears a blue dress.
Buttercup, one of the Powerpuff Girls, is the toughest and most aggressive of the three sisters. With short hair and a green dress, she possesses super strength.
